alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Floyd; Mitchell (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 14 at 7:10PM CST until January 15 at 3:00AM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Snow to Wind Down this Evening... .A winter storm continues to impact the region, however we are seeing the snow taper off from north to south. Some blowing and drifting snow continues as northeast winds gust 15 to 30 mph, especially in open and unsheltered areas. If heading out this evening, check road conditions, slow down, and be prepared for hazardous conditions due to the snow covered roads. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Blowing and drifting of snow with winds gusting 15 to 30 mph this evening. * WHERE...Chickasaw, Floyd and Mitchell Counties. * WHEN...Until 3 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions, reduced visibilities due to the snow and blowing snow, and hazardous travel conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, check 511ia.org in Iowa, 511mn.org in Minnesota, and 511wi.gov in Wisconsin.
